code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{supabase}from'../supabaseClient';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MeetingList=()=>{const[meetings,setMeetings]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchMeetings=async()=>{const{data,error}=await supabase.from('meetings').select('id, date, description, committee_id').order('date',{ascending:false});if(!error){setMeetings(data);}else{console.error(error);}setLoading(false);};fetchMeetings();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading meetings..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:meetings.map(meeting=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:meeting.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:meeting.description})]},meeting.id))});};export default MeetingList;
